timeline.message: Maven plugin: exposed the settings 'node.version' and 'node.download.root'
Use new URI() instead of URI.create(), to validate user input

timeline.body:
I think the correct fix for the unit tests should have been to use e.g.

```java
ReflectionUtils.setVariableValueInObject(mojo, "node.version", FrontendTools.DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION;
```
and the same for the "nodeDownloadRoot" for `BuildFrontendMojoTest` and `PrepareFrontendMojoTest`
